text: John Swab is a writer and director from Tulsa, Oklahoma. His first feature Let Me Make You a Martyr was released in 2017 and starred Mark Boone Junior, Marilyn Manson, Sam Quartin and Niko Nicotera He wrote, produced, and directed Run with the Hunted (2019 film) starring Michael Pitt, Sam Quartin, Ron Perlman, Mark Boone Junior, William Forsythe, and Dree Hemingway His upcoming film Body Brokers stars Melissa Leo, Michael K. Williams, Frank Grillo, Jack Kilmer, Alice Englert, Jessica Rothe, Owen Campbell, Sam Quartin, Thomas Dekker and Peter Greene. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American film directors Category:People from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: John Swab
